value.summary: Primary therapeutic bronchoscopy with biopsy (31628) and radial EBUS localization (+31654). TBNA (31629) bundled.

codes.rationale: Primary service: Forceps biopsy of peripheral nodule.
Localization of peripheral lesion (concentric view) facilitating biopsy.

value.compliance_notes: Diagnostic bronchoscopy (31622) and TBNA (31629) of the same lesion are bundled into 31628.

value.summary: Therapeutic bronchoscopy with biopsy (31628), brushing (31623), and radial EBUS (+31654).

codes.rationale: Distinct sampling modality performed on same target. Subject to Multiple Endoscopy Rule.

financials.note: Payment estimated with MER: 31628 (100%) + 31623 (Difference from Base 31622 is negligible/zero) + 31654 (100%).

value.compliance_notes: 31623 and 31628 are generally allowed together for same site. 31622 bundled.

value.summary: Medical thoracoscopy with biopsy (32609) and tunneled pleural catheter placement (32550).

codes.rationale: Primary procedure: Rigid pleuroscopy with parietal pleura biopsies. Facility RVU not established (carrier priced or OPPS APC 5361: ~$5834).
Secondary procedure: PleurX catheter placed via separate tunnel/exit site. 50% reduction applies.

value.compliance_notes: Thoracentesis (32554/55) bundled into thoracoscopy/IPC. 32550 billed with 51 modifier.

value.summary: Diagnostic bronchoscopy (31622) with navigation (+31627) and radial EBUS (+31654) for dye marking.

codes.rationale: Base procedure. No biopsy performed (marking only).
superDimension navigation to RUL nodule. Status N in OPPS (packaged).
Confirmation of lesion presence prior to dye injection.

value.compliance_notes: ICG injection incidental/part of intervention. Fluoroscopy (76000) bundled.

codes.rationale: Sampling of Station 11L and Lung Mass (2 targets).

value.compliance_notes: Lung mass counts as a structure for 31652/53. Diagnostic bronchoscopy (31622) bundled.
